author: PTI
title: Confidence Group Announces the Launch of Cutting-Edge Hydrogen Cylinders | Headlines
text: Confidence Group Announces the Launch of Cutting-Edge Hydrogen Cylinders Confidence Petroleum India Limited, a leading company in LPG CNG industry is proud to announce its entry into the rapidly growing market of Green Hydrogen Type-4 Cylinder manufacturing by Silversky Exim Pvt. Ltd., a subsidiary of its subsidiary company Confidence Futuristic Energetech Ltd. Confidence Group is committed to playing its vital role in the global energy transition for a cleaner and greener future as the world shifts towards sustainable energy solutions. [PTI](/pti-stories)| Mumbai | Updated: 16-02-2024 14:22 IST | Created: 16-02-2024 14:22 IST - Country: - India Confidence Petroleum India Limited, a leading company in LPG & CNG industry is proud to announce its entry into the rapidly growing market of Green Hydrogen Type-4 Cylinder manufacturing by Silversky Exim Pvt. Ltd., a subsidiary of its subsidiary company Confidence Futuristic Energetech Ltd. Confidence Group is committed to playing its vital role in the global energy transition for a cleaner and greener future as the world shifts towards sustainable energy solutions. With strong focus on innovation and environmental responsibility, the company through production of Type 4 Cylinders is set to revolutionize the hydrogen storage industry and harness the power of green hydrogen. Key Highlights Commitment to sustainable future: In support of Indian Government's policy for reducing environmental pollution, Confidence Group recognizes the immediate need of environmental pollution control and is dedicated to contribute lion's share for sustainable safe future. The Type 4 cylinders will be designed and manufactured with focus on minimizing environmental impact. Cutting-Edge Technology: Confidence Group leveraging the state-of-art technology will deliver high quality Type 4 Cylinders that meet the best industry standards. The innovative designs will optimize storage efficiency and enhance overall reliability of hydrogen-based solutions. Green Hydrogen Leadership: Confidence Group by venturing into green hydrogen market aims to become a frontrunner in providing solutions that accelerate adoption of renewable energy sources. The Type 4 cylinders will play a crucial role in efficient storage and transportation of green hydrogen. Global Impact: Confidence Group foresees global impact through its green hydrogen initiatives. The Type 4 cylinders manufactured by the company shall provide solutions to meet the increasing demand of clean energy storage worldwide thus contributing to reduction of carbon emissions. Collaborative Partnerships Confidence Group is actively engaging in partnership with key players in green hydrogen ecosystem, including technology providers, energy companies and research institutions. These collaborations will further strengthen company's position in driving innovations and sustainability. Mr. Nitin Khara, Chairman & Managing Director, expresses enthusiasm on Confidence Group's foray into Green Hydrogen Type 4 Cylinder manufacturing, stating, ''This strategic move aligns with our core values and commitment to environmental stewardship." We are excited to contribute to the global shift towards a sustainable and carbon-neutral future. Key Features of Type 4 Cylinders a) Type 4 cylinders are made primarily from carbon composite with polymer liner; b) Type 4 cylinders are lighter by 70% as compared to metal cylinders (Type-1); c) Type 4 cylinders transport 3 Times more gas as compared to metal cylinders (Type-1); d) Type-4 cylinders are completely corrosion resistant (Inert Liner) as compared to metal cylinders (Type-1). e) Shatter proof/ Fireproof f) Highly safe/Low Opex/Future ready g) 200 bar/250bar/350bar/multiple applications Confidence Petroleum India Limited, a distinguished name in LPG & CNG sector is listed on both BSE and NSE, has been rated No. 1 by CRISIL and is acclaimed for its innovation, dedication and entrepreneurial excellence. The company's business is spread across different states of the country, to say 15 fully functional LPG cylinder manufacturing plants, 3 High-pressure cylinder manufacturing Plants, 620+ Own fleet of LPG vehicles, an extensive chain of over 248+ auto LPG stations, and 35+ CNG stations in Bangalore,65 + bottling plants, 2000+ GoGas dealer network across 26 Indian states catering to diverse LPG needs of residential, industrial and various business segments with own transport fleet of over 600+ vehicles. For more information, please visit www.confidencegroup.co. (This story has not been edited by Devdiscourse staff and is auto-generated from a syndicated feed.) - READ MORE ON: - [Petroleum India Limited](/news?tag=Petroleum+India+Limited) - [Type-1](/news?tag=Type-1) - [Key Features](/news?tag=Key+Features) - [Green Hydrogen](/news?tag=Green+Hydrogen) - [Plants](/news?tag=Plants) - [Bangalore](/news?tag=Bangalore) - [65](/news?tag=65) - [Confidence Futuristic Energetech Ltd.](/news?tag=Confidence+Futuristic+Energetech+Ltd.) - [Indian](/news?tag=Indian) - [Silversky Exim Pvt. Ltd.](/news?tag=Silversky+Exim+Pvt.+Ltd.) - [LPG & CNG](/news?tag=LPG+%26+CNG) - [Type-4](/news?tag=Type-4) - [Type-4 Cylinder](/news?tag=Type-4+Cylinder) - [Confidence Group's](/news?tag=Confidence+Group%27s) - [CRISIL](/news?tag=CRISIL) - [Confidence Group](/news?tag=Confidence+Group) - [Green Hydrogen Type](/news?tag=Green+Hydrogen+Type) - [Collaborative Partnerships Confidence Group](/news?tag=Collaborative+Partnerships%0aConfidence+Group) - [Shatter proof/ Fireproof](/news?tag=Shatter+proof%2f+Fireproof) - [Inert Liner](/news?tag=Inert+Liner)

title: Informativos Telecinco | Edici√≥n 21 horas, en v√≠deo (22/08/24)
text:
> Prisi√≥n provisional comunicada y sin fianza para el asesino de Mateo en Mocej√≥n Una imagen de alegr√≠a en medio de la devastaci√≥n en Gaza: Abdullah conoce por fin a su hijo El informe de los Mossos reconoce "errores" en el seguimiento de Carles Puigdemont Prisi√≥n provisional comunicada y sin fianza para el asesino de Mateo en Mocej√≥n Prisi√≥n provisional comunicada y sin fianza para el autor confeso de la muerte de Mateo , el ni√±o de 11 a√±os apu√±alado mortalmente mientras se encontraba jugando al f√∫tbol con sus amigos en el polideportivo '√Ångel Ca√≠do' de Mocej√≥n (Toledo).
Una imagen de alegr√≠a en medio de la devastaci√≥n en Gaza: Abdullah conoce por fin a su hijo La guerra en Gaza ha separado a miles de familias y los ni√±os est√°n padeciendo especialmente la crudeza del conflicto. Una de esas familias es la de Abdullah, quien despu√©s de nueve meses alejado de los suyos, por fin ha podido conocer a uno de sus hijos.
El informe de los Mossos reconoce "errores" en el seguimiento de Carles Puigdemont Los Mossos d'Esquadra han admitido que el dispositivo policial dise√±ado para detener al expresidente de la Generalitat Carles Puigdemont durante su fugaz visita a Catalu√±a el pasado 8 de agosto tuvo "errores t√©cnicos y formales", entre ellos que un dron sigui√≥ a una comitiva que se dirig√≠a al Parlament y perdi√≥ al expresident. Tambi√©n reconoce la fe ciega en el expresidente, lo que permiti√≥ "una maniobra de distracci√≥n desarrollada con la cooperaci√≥n involuntaria de miles de personas y la actividad organizada de un grupo de colaboradores pr√≥ximos".

author: P. Fava
title: Llega una potente DANA a Espa√±a: Aemet avisa de las zonas con fuertes lluvias este fin de semana
text: [Meteorolog√≠a](/ciencia/meteorologia/) Llega una potente DANA a Espa√±a: Aemet avisa de las zonas con fuertes lluvias este fin de semana El fin de semana traer√° un acusado ascenso de las temperaturas pero pronto ser√° sustituido por nuevas borrascas y lluvias.10 mayo, 2024 13:18 Los term√≥metros superar√°n los 30¬∫C en amplias zonas del centro, este y sur de la Pen√≠nsula durante este fin de semana, [rebasando de 5 a 10¬∫C las temperaturas normales](https://www.elespanol.com/ciencia/meteorologia/20240508/locura-meteorologica-llega-espana-calor-puro-verano-aemet-tormentas-zonas/853664730_0.html) para la √©poca del a√±o, adelanta el portavoz de la Agencia Estatal de Meteorolog√≠a (AEMET), Rub√©n del Campo. Pero el paso de una DANA por el norte de la Pen√≠nsula dejar√° lluvias y chubascos que podr√≠an ser localmente fuertes. Este jueves, explica Del Campo, Montoro (C√≥rdoba, Valle del Guadalquivir) roz√≥ 34¬∫C y El Granado (Huelva, en el Valle del Guadiana), los super√≥. A lo largo de este viernes se podr√≠an dar registros similares en esas zonas. En general, se superar√°n de nuevo los 30¬∫C en buena parte del centro y sur de la Pen√≠nsula, as√≠ como en la depresi√≥n del Ebro. Por otro lado, la inestabilidad ir√° en aumento durante la jornada en el noroeste de la Pen√≠nsula. Por la tarde se formar√°n tormentas que podr√≠an alcanzar intensidad fuerte especialmente en el interior de Galicia, pero tambi√©n en puntos del sur de Asturias y noroeste de Castilla y Le√≥n. [ [El sencillo h√°bito diario que reduce un 20% las muertes por infarto: muy pocos lo hacen en Espa√±a](https://www.elespanol.com/ciencia/salud/20240504/sencillo-habito-diario-reduce-muertes-infarto-pocos-hacen-espana/851664987_0.html)] Los cielos amanecer√°n nubosos en el noroeste de la Pen√≠nsula durante el s√°bado como consecuencia de la influencia de la DANA, y habr√° chubascos tormentosos en zonas del interior de Galicia, en las comunidades cant√°bricas y en Castilla y Le√≥n. Los chubascos podr√°n ser localmente fuertes y podr√≠an afectar a otras zonas del norte de la Pen√≠nsula, aunque con algo menos de probabilidad. "Ya durante la primera mitad del s√°bado se formar√°n aguaceros localmente tormentosos que descargar√°n en el entorno del sector occidental de la Cordillera Cant√°brica, Castilla y Le√≥n, La Rioja e interior de Galicia. Tambi√©n se prev√©n chubascos m√°s dispersos en las Penib√©ticas, Estrecho y en la cordillera pirenaica", explica Samuel Biener, [experto de Meteored](https://www.tiempo.com/noticias/prediccion/manana-una-dana-dejara-tormentas-fuertes-con-lluvias-y-granizo-en-estas-zonas-de-espana.html). "En las horas centrales del d√≠a y por la tarde las tormentas ir√°n ganando intensidad, traslad√°ndose a otras zonas conforme el embolsamiento de aire fr√≠o vaya avanzando hacia el este. Los aguaceros ser√°n localmente fuertes en la Cordillera Cant√°brica, Pa√≠s Vasco, Navarra, La Rioja e Ib√©rico Norte", prosigue. "Tambi√©n har√°n acto de presencia en buena parte de la Meseta Norte. Tambi√©n de forma m√°s irregular y dispersa en el Pirineo y en zonas de monta√±a del sureste". üå¶Ô∏è La primavera no suele dejar que nos acostumbremos a un tipo de tiempo y es lo que va a pasar estos d√≠as.‚Äî Meteored | tiempo.com (@MeteoredES) üëâ Primero ser√° la [#DANA]y la pr√≥xima semana una borrasca fr√≠a y la irrupci√≥n de aire polar que desplomar√° las temperaturas. üîªüå°Ô∏è üåê [https://t.co/xIkDlFPouj] [pic.twitter.com/jOvCJfTbZn] [May 10, 2024] Aemet avisa de que las temperaturas bajar√°n en el noroeste peninsular por la mayor nubosidad, mientras que en el resto permanecer√°n sin cambios y se registrar√°n m√°s de 30¬∫C en la depresi√≥n del Ebro y amplias zonas del centro y sur del territorio peninsular. De hecho, ciudades como Zaragoza, C√≥rdoba o Toledo podr√≠an rondar 32¬∫C y Sevilla, 33¬∫C. La inestabilidad se desplazar√° el domingo hacia el este de la Pen√≠nsula. Habr√° de nuevo lluvias y chubascos en las comunidades cant√°bricas, el este de Castilla y Le√≥n, en la Rioja, Navarra, Arag√≥n y en general en zonas de monta√±a del interior oriental peninsular. Del Campo ha puntualizado que estos chubascos podr√≠an alcanzar tambi√©n intensidad fuerte localmente y ser tormentosos, especialmente en la cordillera cant√°brica, en torno al sistema ib√©rico y en los Pirineos. Paralelamente, los cielos estar√°n poco nubosos en general en el resto del pa√≠s. Adem√°s, bajar√°n las temperaturas en Galicia, el Cant√°brico, en puntos del este de Castilla y Le√≥n y en zonas pr√≥ximas. Mientras, puntos del este centro y sur de la Pen√≠nsula registrar√°n m√°s de 30¬∫C.

author: By
title: Woman says her Stanley cup saved her life from a stray bullet
text:
STEUBENVILLE, Ohio (Gray News/TMX) ‚Äì A woman in Ohio claims her Stanley tumbler saved her from being hit by a stray bullet.
A 22-year-old named Rachel posted about the Feb. 12 incident on TikTok, which has since gone viral.
Rachel told TMX she and her fianc√© David were inside their home in the city of Steubenville when they heard gunshots outside.
She said they heard about seven or eight gunshots and then one ‚Äúreally loud bang‚Äù from a bullet that came through the wall of the house and ricocheted off her Stanley tumbler, which was sitting directly in front of her.
After bouncing off the Stanley cup, the bullet changed direction and went through a bottle of perfume before landing on the kitchen floor, Rachel said.
The couple said they hid until police officers arrived.
Rachel‚Äôs video on TikTok documents the path of the bullet, showing the hole through her wall, the mark on her Stanley cup where the bullet bounced off, and the hole in her perfume bottle. The video also shows the bullet on her kitchen floor.
While some TikTok users questioned the authenticity of the claims, Rachel posted a follow-up video showing police in her home, investigating the scene.
Gray News has reached out to Steubenville police for comment.
However, some fellow Stanley fans were not surprised to hear that their favorite cup was indestructible, even against a bullet.
‚ÄúWho needs body armor? Just grab your Stanley,‚Äù one TikTok user wrote.
‚ÄúI‚Äôm convinced Stanleys are immortal,‚Äù another wrote.
Copyright 2024 Gray Media Group, Inc. All rights reserved. TMX contributed to this report.
